DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine ability exisulind inhibit growth development duodenal adenoma patient familial adenomatous polyposis . - Determine effect apoptosis polyp v mucosal tissue patient treat drug . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral exisulind 4 time daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo 4 time daily . Treatment continue 1 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient ( 50 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
